behavior identify_chicken_and_pasta(chicken:item, pasta:item):
    body:
        assert is_food_chicken(chicken)
        assert is_dry_pasta(pasta)

behavior cook_chicken(chicken:item, stove:item, fryingpan:item):
    body:
        assert is_stove(stove)
        assert is_fryingpan(fryingpan)
        assert on(fryingpan, stove)
        achieve is_on(stove)
        achieve inside(chicken, fryingpan)
        achieve is_food_carrot(chicken)

behavior cook_pasta(pasta:item, pot:item, stove:item):
    body:
        assert is_pot(pot)
        assert is_on(stove)
        achieve has_water(pot)
        achieve inside(pasta, pot)
        achieve is_food_carrot(pasta)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        bind pasta: item where:
            is_dry_pasta(pasta)
        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        bind pot: item where:
            is_pot(pot)
        bind fryingpan: item where:
            is_fryingpan(fryingpan)
        cook_chicken(chicken, stove, fryingpan)
        cook_pasta(pasta, pot, stove)

behavior cook_chicken_and_pasta(chicken:item, pasta:item, pot:item, stove:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(chicken, pot)
        # Place the chicken inside the pot
        achieve inside(pasta, pot)
        # Place the pasta inside the pot
        achieve on(pot, stove)
        # Place the pot on the stove
        achieve is_on(stove)
        # Turn on the stove to start cooking

behavior __goal__():

        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Select chicken

            is_dry_pasta(pasta)
        # Select dry pasta

            is_pot(pot)
        # Select a pot
        bind stove: item where:
            is_stove(stove)
        # Select a stove
        cook_chicken_and_pasta(chicken, pasta, pot, stove)

behavior cook_chicken_and_pasta_together(chicken:item, pasta:item, pot:item, stove:item):

        achieve inside(chicken, pot)
        achieve inside(pasta, pot)
        achieve close_char(char, stove)
        achieve is_on(stove)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        bind pasta: item where:
            is_dry_pasta(pasta)
        foreach pot: item:
            if is_pot(pot) and not visited(pot):
                # Look for a pot to cook
                observe(pot, "Check is there any pot available for cooking")
                if visited(pot):
                    bind stove: item where:
                        is_stove(stove) and close(stove, pot)
                    # Select a stove that is close to a pot
                    cook_chicken_and_pasta_together(chicken, pasta, pot, stove)
